title: PR & Communications Intern
description: smunch is a young food technology startup based berlin we live by the simple belief that eating well is a key to a happier life and it s usually a challenge for office goers to live up to their health commitments especially on work days and we re on a mission to be the first virtual canteen the city and to make it easy for companies to provide healthy mindful food for their employees at smunch we re building the future of workplace lunch our founding team brings significant experience the food technology industry and venture development we re building a culture of growth learning fun and looking out for great candidates to join our team your responsibilities help develop and support the rollout of brand promotion and engagement strategies content creation to drive traffic engagement leads that deliver sales and customer retention help design communication material using different tools such as adobe creative cloud canva picmonkey etc manage copywriting and translations english german for posts blogs mailings newsletters manage the content marketing schedule posts updates across social media platforms and blogs liaise with journalists bloggers and writers the food tech scene berlin curate relevant external resources maintain contact with industry influencers and bloggers give a hand to everyday operations it s a lot of fun you bring your passion lesen all things digital all things marketing and all things social you have a strong interest photography and picture editing food photography skills would be a plus but not a must prior experience social media marketing for startups or other prior experience content creation and content marketing english german photoshop skills illustrator and indesign skills would be a plus entrepreneurial streak you re very hands on creative and self motivated excellent communication skills both english and german you re very organized good at managing your time and multi tasking you re fun to work with smart and eager to learn love for good food what we offer opportunity to join us full time at the end of a successful internship chance to shape a startup the very exciting food tech space a young motivated and experienced founding team we re always learning and pushing boundaries for us that s the first step to a fulfilling career great work environment and modern co working office space we re a food startup and there s going to be healthy delicious food on the table compensated with delicious food fine print this is internship with a path to a full time role with regards international candidates we re open to applications only if you already have a valid work stay permit germany send your application to work smunch co with the subject line pr marketing intern your application tell us why you d like to work with smunch and why we would enjoy working with you about company smunch is smart lunch we re a food technology startup out to build the future of workplace lunch we live by the simple belief that eating well is a key to a happier life we re on a mission to make it easy for companies to provide healthy mindful food for their employees we take great pride our attention to detail from designing a balanced menu carefully selecting our food partners to bringing lunch environmentally friendly packaging all of this your hardworking teams can have a smart lunch at work without the work smunch is headquartered berlin de to apply for this job email your details to below mail address apply using webmail you can apply to this job and others using your online resume click the link below to submit your online resume and email your application to this employer apply with xing current past education email cover letter optional to whom it may concern i very interested the pr communications intern position at smunch co i believe my skills and work experience make me ideal candidate for this role i look forward to speaking with you soon about this position thank you for your consideration best regards clicking submit submit your full profile to smunch co close job category company social top jobs share this job related jobs about germany startup jobs germany startup deliberations with the svp marketing and vp design to harmonize our brand across product and communications programs ensure all marketing communications consistently present our brand values and messaging at a high quality work closely with outbound business development and sales to integrate inbound strategy with account based marketing programs collaborate with hr to design and execute consistent employee brand communications build marketing capabilities content marketing event management and analytics forecast and present to senior management and help the svp marketing achieve greater marketing success awareness inbound leads pipeline and revenues requirements ba bsc or higher expert end to end inbound marketing who understands the b2b marketing funnel and how to generate customers from leads strong analytical skills to extract meaning from data and use this to optimize a team s approach and company s forecast proven track record running successful b2b campaigns personal experience blogging and growing audience on social media high tech marketing and enterprise saas experience excellent written and verbal communication skills benefits create a technology title: SEO Manager (m/f)
description: about helpling the home cleaning market helpling operates is mainly dominated by non regulation and intransparency with technology and clear processes we are changing entire industry no more time consuming search or tough decision making finding a cleaner now takes less than seconds instead of several weeks a newly structured process we connect people who need help with their housework with trusted and insured cleaners via phone tablet or laptop for cleaners our technology platform makes it easier than ever to access new clients and to manage when and where they want to work our vision to digitise the world of home services has raised us more than million from renowned internet pioneers such as lakestar and mangrove capital today we are a team of two thirds of which are based at our headquarter the heart of berlin if you want to make a difference and help change a whole industry then this is your place we are currently looking for experienced seo manager m f for our team berlin about the job you own the roadmap for onpage and offpage seo for international markets cooperation with the head of seo you drive the execution of seo projects collaboration with other teams like product management design and development you identify new seo growth opportunities through seo audits seo best practices and other departments like cro and bi you be applying best practices as well as making sure that resources are used effectively and cross functionally providing reports directly to the head of seo daily tasks include competitors and keywords analysis as well as building links and content furthermore you closely collaborate with our country teams to plan monthly targets to drive and control our seo activities who we re looking for after earning a university degree you have already gained years of professional experience the field of seo and performance marketing the ideal candidate has a deep understanding of seo best practices and expertise seo and traffic analytics tools like google analytics google search console semrush ahrefs screaming frog botify and adwords you possess knowledge of html css javascript and you have good excel skills you are a data driven decision maker with strong analytical skills and you are able to manage multiple projects at the same time perfect english language skills complete your profile what we offer helpling is one of the most exciting startups the heart of berlin with a disruptive product and well backed by investors of international renown you work international team with flat hierarchies and short communication channels which your work can have a real impact for helpling everyday we support your personal and professional development with challenging projects and space for learning a great environment with office parties team events bbqs dance into the morning events kicker table tennis if your profile match our requirements we are looking forward to receive your convincing application praktikum internship m f stellenbeschreibung marketing praktikum internship m f bremen germanyhighly competitive salary benefits packagejuly start dat we re mondelēz international the world s leading maker of chocolate biscuits candy and gum we market our products countries and have annual net revenues of billion even if you re not familiar with our name you ve almost certainly heard of our billion dollar brands like cadbury milka prince and oreo creating and developing the world s favorite snacks we re passionate about creating delicious moments of joy for people all around the world big enough to reach the top small enough to help you get off the ground want a small taste of life at mondelez then sink your teeth into one of our huge opportunities we currently have opportunity for a marketing praktikum internship to join our team based bremen the roleof the marketing praktikum internship marketing you ll be the ones who first capture our consumers imaginations giving them a tantalizing taste of our brands you ll work to help our brands stay relevant to consumers by developing and activating brand plans that capture their imagination passion and loyalty support the brand manager the biscuits the design of the marketing mix and the development of new productscreating targeted market and competition analyses as well as deriving from concrete marketing measuresassisting the development of sampling and promotion concepts together with external agencies as well as their of your own projects such as independent creation of sales documents for distributionwhat we look for the marketing praktikum internship there are a few things you ll need to join our tantalisingly innovativ company along with the confidence to try new and challenging experiences you must be enthusiastic about learning and eager to develop whilst creating moments of joy we look for all sorts of qualities graduates drive creativity interpersonal savvy business acumen we like people who aren t afraid to stehen alone who deal with ambiguity instead of ignoring it and who know how to approach any problem no matter how difficult if you have these qualities and are committed to making the most of your talents you ll fit right here qualifications studying towards a bachelors or a masters with focus on marketing and ideally relevant practical experience through qualified internships or similar the country or abroad strong communication skills analytical skills goal oriented approach and numbers affinity a high degree of creativity initiative and enthusiasm for working with brands fun at the independent organized and varied work fluent german and english as well as computer literacy ms office at mondelēz international we want you to thrive that s why we foster a culture which people believe each other and want to grow together one which you re given the chance to lead and have your ideas heard but which you re encouraged to help others too are you interested the role of the marketing praktikum internship please send up to dat cv via the apply now optionen aktuell informationen unternehmen monster profil anzeigen weiter jobs

be responsible for defining and implementing measurement strategies that align with marketing and business objectives producing meaningful marketing kpi dashboards cross channel performance reports with actionable insight improving efficiency digital marketing strategies your new role challenging and future oriented identify objectives and advise on suitable measurement strategies benchmark title: Marketing Analytics Manager (m/f)
description: at amazon we are working to be the most customer centric company on earth to get there we need exceptionally talented bright and driven people if you would like to help us build the place to find and buy anything online this is your chance we are currently looking for a marketing analytics manager m f to support the european marketing organization the marketing analytics team provides a comprehensive understanding of customer segments affinities and lifetime value we predict the customer purchase and engagement behaviors and decide where when and how we provide products and programs to our customers to meet their needs and ideally to delight them we help to increase sales and customer engagement and improve targeting and marketing efficiency our systems are built entirely house and on the cutting edge automated large scale analytics systems the marketing analytics manager generates insights suggests campaign designs and tactics supporting all marketing channels sem seo affiliates display social mobile email onsite etc you have the opportunity to work on the forefront of consumer analytics tackling some of the most difficult problems the industry with some of the best scientists statisticians and software engineers the field the position is based berlin your responsibilities understand the business challenges faced by the uk marketing team but be ready to help other marketplaces across eu with actionable insights and concise recommendations design and conduct rigorous experiments on the effectiveness and efficiency of different marketing actions that inform long term strategy support advertising measurement of various amazon programs and help optimize remuneration models for marketing affiliates leverage customer data to increase the efficiency of our marketing spend working closely with the channel teams on campaign optimization update existing and create new metrics and reporting that help drive business decisionsbasic qualifications bachelor s degree mathematics statistics operational research or related discipline some years of experience marketing analytics a big data environment proficiency analytical data manipulation on large marketing databases and external data sources expert using excel for data analysis and modeling able to generate ideas and solve problems independently ability to manage multiple cross functional projects across multiple geographies complete fluency english excellent writing skills willingness to roll up the sleeves and do whatever is necessary to meet team goals and deadlinespreferred qualifications advanced degree statistics operational research business or related discipline good knowledge of sql and working with relational databases experience with building scalable reporting knowledge of data visualization software microstrategy tableau experience working within a high growth fasen paced technology companyis this a challenge you would like to take on is this the kind of environment which you thrive if start looking forward to the excellent opportunities we have to offer your professional development as well as our attractive compensation package that make you a part of our company s success by submitting your resume and application information you authorize amazon to transmit and store your information the amazon group of companies world wide recruitment databas and to circulate that information as necessary for the purpose of evaluating your qualifications for this or other job vacancies

stakeholders within the international sales unit the senior international shopper marketing category manager steer and spread best practices to turn shopper and category insights into growth opportunities to ensure henkel is perceived as preferred partner the international shopper marketing category manager maintain a spirit of teamwork between all country trade marketing shopper marketing and category managers and constantly search ways to optimize the level of expertise perceived by our retail trade partners what we offer build a shopper marketing category management roadmap to pursue elevating henkel capabilities and knowledge and stay ahead of the industry best practices cascade strategy to all regions countries and ensure the regional and local shopper marketing category management activities are closely linked and aligned with the overall strategy proactively look for superior innovativ future oriented solutions shopper customer insights technology platform tools suppliers agencies to grow henkel business and expertise globally and locally coach and train teams newcomers and any internal stakeholders to cascade henkel shopper marketing category management strategy tools and practices carry out actual vs plan analysis of category management projects captaincies at regional local level support and steer content creation point of sales tool kit for major innovations monitor innovativ promotion trade marketing practices and roll out within countries who we are looking for university degree business administration or marketing at least to years of working experience marketing or sales including significant shopper marketing category management for mass consumption brands fluent english written and verbal good knowledge of ms office role model and setting pace within international environment with indirect management responsibilities direct reportee strong analytical skills highly structured person able to manage several projects parallel and work under tight deadlines excellent presentation and communication skills including to top international key accounts or top management energy passion for innovation apply online if this title: PR Manager, Amazon Devices (f/m)
description: work hard have fun make history amazon s overall mission is simple it s for amazon to be the place where customers can find discover and buy anything online whatever customers want amazon find the means to deliver it with your help amazon continue to enable people to discover new worlds and implement innovation this is your chance to make history amazon germany is seeking a smart self motivated and creative individual f m for the role of pr manager providing pr support services to different amazon businesses retail for devices including amazon echo and digital for the alexa voice service key responsibilities include working closely with a senior pr manager and retained pr agency to implement pr initiatives which help communicate the reputation of amazon designed devices kindle fire tablets fire tv echo and digital services such as alexa helping implement proactive pr campaigns to drive awareness for amazon products and services and supporting the day to day activities of the amazon press office including proactive and reactive media relations able to work at internet speed you f m have a track record of working on major campaigns a high level of creativity and extensive experience dealing with lifestyle as well as consumer technology media contacts and national news desks the successful candidate benefit from a highly competitive salary and benefits package your responsibilities managing proactive campaigns and delivering clear results focused reports linked back to objectives working with external pr support to implement proactive pr plans for devices including amazon echo kindle fire tablets and fire tv as well as support digital s alexa voice service using product and service features to execute proactive plans proactive and reactive media relations as part of the amazon press office building and maintaining strong relationships with key media contacts successfully tackling complex fasen moving and unexpected communications challengesbasicen qualifications multiple years of agency or house pr experience experience with working with major brands preferably the consumer technology sector media relations experience representing high profile consumer brands eith house or agency experience dealing with consumer media contacts across news technology and broadcast knowledge of the consumer technology sector excellent written and spoken german and english skills preferred qualifications knowledge about what s going on the media and a certain passion for amazon products and services to ensure a maximum pr impact proactive enjoys taking responsibility and making things happen desire to work with the media proactively to generate awareness ability to inspire agencies experience international environmentsounds interesting we look forward to your application please apply online and upload your cv and a letter of motivation one document max mb by submitting your resume and application information you authorize amazon to transmit and store your information the amazon group of companies world wide recruitment databas and to circulate that information as necessary for the purpose of evaluating your qualifications for this or other job vacancies

title: Marketing Analytics Manager (m/f)
description: at amazon we are working to be the most customer centric company on earth to get there we need exceptionally talented bright and driven people if you would like to help us build the place to find and buy anything online this is your chance we are currently looking for a marketing analytics manager m f to support the european marketing organization the marketing analytics team provides a comprehensive understanding of customer segments affinities and lifetime value we predict the customer purchase and engagement behaviors and decide where when and how we provide products and programs to our customers to meet their needs and ideally to delight them we help to increase sales and customer engagement and improve targeting and marketing efficiency our systems are built entirely house and on the cutting edge automated large scale analytics systems the marketing analytics manager generates insights suggests campaign designs and tactics supporting all marketing channels sem seo affiliates display social mobile email onsite etc you have the opportunity to work on the forefront of consumer analytics tackling some of the most difficult problems the industry with some of the best scientists statisticians and software engineers the field the position is based munich or berlin your responsibilities understand the business challenges faced by the uk marketing team but be ready to help other marketplaces across eu with actionable insights and concise recommendations design and conduct rigorous experiments on the effectiveness and efficiency of different marketing actions that inform long term strategy support advertising measurement of various amazon programs and help optimize remuneration models for marketing affiliates leverage customer data to increase the efficiency of our marketing spend working closely with the channel teams on campaign optimization update existing and create new metrics and reporting that help drive business decisions bachelor s degree mathematics statistics operational research or related discipline some years of experience marketing analytics a big data environment proficiency analytical data manipulation on large marketing databases and external data sources expert using excel for data analysis and modeling able to generate ideas and solve problems independently ability to manage multiple cross functional projects across multiple geographies complete fluency english excellent writing skills willingness to roll up the sleeves and do whatever is necessary to meet team goals and deadlines advanced degree statistics operational research business or related discipline good knowledge of sql and working with relational databases experience with building scalable reporting knowledge of data visualization software microstrategy tableau experience working within a high growth fasen paced technology companyis this a challenge you would like to take on is this the kind of environment which you thrive if start looking forward to the excellent opportunities we have to offer your professional development as well as our attractive compensation package that make you a part of our company s success by submitting your resume and application information you authorize amazon to transmit and store your information the amazon group of companies world wide recruitment databas and to circulate that information as necessary for the purpose of evaluating your qualifications for this or other job vacancies

title: Insights Product Manager Shopper Marketing, Consumer Eletronics (m/f)
description: amazon media group amg is looking for a motivated analytical product thinker self starter to provide rich insights for our advertisers and help pave the path for the next generation of display advertising products display advertising is one of amazon s fasen growing and most profitable businesses and amazon s robust data is a fundamental differentiators providing high quality actionable insights is a crucial key to our success on one end the insights manager is a very customer centric position working closely with amg s consumer electronics ce sales teams to deliver robust data driven insights drive campaign strategy and help drive innovation on behalf of our advertisers on the other end you take customer needs and insights to envision new products and tools to help develop them with our engineering and platform teams you have responsibility for multiple high profile ce clients first and foremost you collaborate with the team to service clients pre mid and post campaign by utilizing our suite of targeting and analytics products addition you use the knowledge about our customers to develop new products and tools working closely with our engineering teams and informing the direction of measurement and analytics products specific responsibilities you utilize amazon s marketing measurement and data platforms to help our ce advertisers understand the impact of their marketing investments with amazon sometimes this entail pulling a standard report and mining millions of rows of data for insights you work closely with sales and account management to make data driven decisions around media planning and strategy you are responsible for the relationship with our clients analytics and insights teams to jointly drive en plans research and innovation represent the voice of the customer identifying repeatable solutions that can be built to scale to serve more advertisers act as a liaison to product teams to help productize these solutions advocate and educate clients and internal teams on amazon s ad platform products a bachelor s degree is required preferably analytical field e g economics computer science mathematics statistics or finance strong analytical and quantitative skills especially applied to marketing analysis able to source work with and combine disparate data sets to answ business questions strong oral and written communication skills are critical strong client facing experience strong problem solving ability task prioritization and ownership several years experience data mining and statistical analyses several years of sql experience high proficiency excel pivot tables charts proven experience advertising or e commerce product management or product marketing is required preferably data and analytics this includes agency consulting experience these industries several years predictive modeling ability to create visual basic macros for automations excel strong working knowledge of tableau experienc using python context of data handling and analysis mba digital advertising and e commerce experience experience online advertising or web based technologies experience partnering with sales and or engineering teamabout our rewardswe ll expect you to goen the extra mile but we ll make sure you re well rewarded as well as a competitive salary and stock units we offer a host of other benefits if you thrive a challenging and fasen paced environment you ll meet your match with us as you be part of a vibe of constant improvement where the things you do one moment you not necessarily be doing months later we don t like to sit still which is why we always treat every day like the first day a day to make more good things happen for our customers it s that kind of spirit that drives our success now and keeps us ahead of the competition the future and you could be part of it it s as simple as this work hard have fun make history sounds interesting we look forward to your application please apply online and upload your cv and a letter of motivation one document max mb by submitting your resume and application information you authorize amazon to transmit and store your information the amazon group of companies world wide recruitment databas and to circulate that information as necessary for the purpose of evaluating your qualifications for this or other job vacancies

title: Manager Customer Marketing EMEA (M/F)
description: vacant position at the weber emea hq marketing department berlin as international leading brand weber stands for quality excellence and innovation worldwide to develop our business with a more holistic approach and to strengthen our pan european best practices we have created the weber stephen products emea headquarters berlin here we have a vacant position the marketing department where you be part of a strong international team as manager customer marketing emea m f manager sell dealer concept about the job working at our emea headquarters you be responsible for developing concepts and guidelines for sell mechanism and best class dealer concepts to support emea business strategy and sales goals you report to the head of trade shopper marketing and give advice on strategicen tasks for local adaption and execution within the different countries the responsibilities include driving future approach for sell concepts and mechanism incl inspiring and compelling content professional charts storyline graphs multimedia presentations developing trade launch storylines leading and coordinating the development of various sell materials price lists catalogues folders etc evolving frame concepts for emea wide scope and supporting the countries the adaptation for local hero concepts developing dealer training concepts that are winning and grounded emea brand and sales strategy and support execution evolving approach of service partner concept and required activities to broaden scope emea wide supporting planning and execution of spoga and design plan and coordinate other trade shows about you you are a committed responsible person with experience trade marketing and related sell mechanism you like to be a part of international matrix based project teams that work across borders to get success every single project you have a hands on mentality and like to have a lot of different projects running at the same time you have a relevant education e g bachelor s or master degree and at least years of experience a similar role you have extensive knowledge and experience trade marketing the related sell mechanism and category management have international project management experience and enjoy working international environment and with various cultures demonstrated strength planning organizing and project management skills to meet tight deadlines have the ability to create convincing presentations to translate brand and sales objectives into customer strategies and plans around distribution merchandising promotion and placement experience organizing events and trade shows is a plus have excellent english and german skills both written and spoken have the possibility to move to berlin where you be located at our headquarters love to barbecue and to promote the fantastic weber lifestyle we create every day as a rapidly growing company we offer you a pleasant international working atmosphere a dynamic team attractive compensation and benefits as well as many opportunities to take responsibility and to develop professionally is this your dream position please send your job application cv and other relevant information including the earliest possible starting dat of your employment and your desired salary to weber stephen products emea gmbh leipziger straße berlin email for any questions please contact our hr department on
